ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ascl0.a | |- A = ( algSc ` W ) |
| 2 |  | ascl0.f | |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) |
| 3 |  | assaascl0.a | |- ( ph -> W e. AssAlg ) |
| 4 |  | #P_assalmod | |- ( W e. AssAlg -> W e. LMod ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) |
| 6 |  | #P_assaring | |- ( W e. AssAlg -> W e. Ring ) |
| 7 | 3, 6 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> W e. Ring ) |
| 8 | 1, 2, 5, 7 | #P_ascl0 | |- ( ph -> ( A ` ( 0g ` F ) ) = ( 0g ` W ) ) |
